code: import React from'react';import{Navigate,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const{user,loading}=useAuth();const location=useLocation();if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login",state:{from:location},replace:true});}return children;};export default ProtectedRoute;
